data.sentence: The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.
data.sentence: The word يَرْجِعُونَ comes from the root ر ج ع and is associated with the meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.

data.meanings: To entertain a guest, that with which a guest is entertained. To collect, run to/into. To explore; investigate; with a much and diligent search, city/town.
data.sentence: The word قَرْيَةٍ comes from the root ق ر ي and is associated with the meanings: To entertain a guest, that with which a guest is entertained. To collect, run to/into. To explore; investigate; with a much and diligent search, city/town.

data.meanings: to die, perish, wasted, be lost, destroyed, spoiled.
data.sentence: The word أَهْلَكْنَاهَا comes from the root ه ل ك and is associated with the meanings: to die, perish, wasted, be lost, destroyed, spoiled.

data.meanings: To forbid, prevent, prohibit, make or declare unlawful, deprive, declare a thing sacred.
data.sentence: The word وَحَرَامٌ comes from the root ح ر م and is associated with the meanings: To forbid, prevent, prohibit, make or declare unlawful, deprive, declare a thing sacred.
